title: Send an Email to a Group in my Thunderbird Address Book
content: I quite literally feel like an IDIOT!!! All I want to do is send a [BCC:] Email to a Group I created in my Thunderbird Address Book, and I can't figure it out! And a Google search was ZERO HELP! WHAT AM I MISSING!!!??? HELP!!! I am using Version 1.128.1esr

title: I wish to change my email address
content: I wish to change my email address on thunderbird account, i have been getting a lot of scam emails from unknown sources and will be cancelling darrell8@tpg.com.au email and changing to darrell8@gmx.com and wish to change email address and keep contacts.
